title: Errors while watching replays
body: Hello! I try to download and watch replays of pro players from op.gg. But they are with lags all the time. Or replay starts from 10 minute. For example after 2/3 of replay length I get "Unable to download spectator data. The game will now exit." error. Or replay starts from 10 minute. Is it problem on my side or with replay files? How to fix it?

replies.body:
We can't provide any sort of troubleshooting for Op.gg replays. I'd recommend checking out their [**Help Page**](http://na.op.gg/help/observer/) or maybe reach out to them on [**Twitter**](https://twitter.com/globalopgg).

Let me know if you have any questions.
